autoTranslateExtra.message: After opening, the received message will be automatically translated without manually clicking Translate.

chromeOnly.message: Currently only supports Chrome use, other browsers need to use email login

clickSetHotkey.message: Click on the settings shortcut, you can quickly translate the message to be sent

contactSpeakLangExtra.message: The language into which the message you send will be translated, usually the language of the other party

contactSpeakLangTip.message: If set to auto, the program will automatically detect the other party's language

description.message: An automatic translation tool for Whatsapp messages in more than 100 languages (unofficial)

earlyBird.message: Early bird discount for a limited time!

enterToSend.message: Enter to send and translate messages

enterToSendExtra.message: After opening, pressing the Enter key will send and translate the message (the custom shortcut will be ignored, this configuration modification needs to be refreshed to the whatsapp page to take effect)

fastTranslateExtra.message: When turned on, when using shortcut, messages are automatically sent while translating

firstLogin.message: The first time you log in, you will immediately receive a 3-day professional membership.

languageDetectionEngineExtra.message: Select the engine used to recognize the message language

limitTip.message: ❗️ Sorry, you have reached the daily trial limit (30 times/day), please try again tomorrow. (PRO users are unlimited)

nativeLanguageInterceptionExtra.message: After enabling, when the message is not translated, intercept the sent message (this configuration change needs to refresh the whatsapp page to take effect)

needToRefresh.message: (This configuration modification needs to refresh the whatsapp page to take effect)

noDeeplPreview.message: This engine does not currently support the preview function

proLimitTip.message: Sorry, this feature is limited to PRO users only.

settingTip.message: After the first installation, you need to refresh the whatsapp page before the configuration will take effect.

showLangStatusExtra.message: After opening, the language translated from will be displayed after the translation. Click on the language to switch.

translateBilingualExtra.message: After opening, bilingual content will be displayed (the translation is displayed against the original)

translateTerminologyExtra.message: Once set, the term function will preferentially recognize and replace the content in the vocabulary, which is often used to replace proper nouns and abbreviations. Note that the function is case-sensitive and will retain all entered punctuation, including spaces.

translateTextColorExtra.message: The color of the translated content

translationInterception.message: The message has not been translated and stopped sending. Please translate it before sending it, or click the system send button to force it to be sent.

translationPreviewExtra.message: After opening, a preview of the translated content will be displayed in real time, which helps to improve the translation accuracy

translationSwitchExtra.message: After closing, the program will stop working

yourLanguageExtra.message: The language into which the message you receive will be translated, usually your native language
